job.title: React/React Native Engineer
job.description: Role: React/React Native EngineerLocation: Remote - USA Type: FulltimeJob DescriptionWe are looking for a React/React Native Engineer with strong problem-solving skills. This position will play a key role in the continued development of our products, which have real-life impacts on tens of thousands of people per year. Requirements:Excellent communication skillsA deep understanding of ReactDeep experience with React NativeExperience with REST APIsExperience with version control, preferably GitConstantly strive to expand knowledge and stay current with new engineering tools Nice to Have/Want to Learn:Native Mobile Application Development experienceFastlane or other CI/CD ExperienceAutomated testing experienceIf you are interested, please share a good time and your number for a short discussion. Alternatively, you could share your updated resume at anosh.kumar@bayonesolutions.com or call me at (925) 218-2347. Looking forward to hearing from you!
